popover.title: Search
popover.description: Search clinical variables of interest. Here, the term "{{searchTerm}}" was used to get all results related to {{searchTerm}}. Click anywhere to continue the tour.

popover.title: Refine Search
popover.description: Use the options displayed here to further refine your search results using facets.

popover.title: Search Results
popover.description: The search results are displayed in this area. Each row describes a different variable that matches your search term and/or facets.

popover.title: Variable Details
popover.description: To learn more about a variable, click on the row or click the information icon.

popover.title: Apply Filters
popover.description: Click the filter icon to apply inclusion criteria to build your cohort.

popover.title: Export Variable
popover.description: Click the export icon to add a variable to your export without applying a filter.

popover.title: Cohort Summary
popover.description: You can view the summary of the filtered cohort based on the applied variable filters. Additionally, you can also view variable distributions and prepare your cohort for analysis.

popover.title: Help Resources
popover.description: To learn more about PIC-SURE, please consult the user guide and video demonstrations. You can also find these resources on the help page.
